mapper.update: update eb_user_notice set type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, user = #{user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=BIT}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, type, user, title, content, add_time, is_send, send_time, ctime, uid from eb_user_notice
